text: Marko Brainović (born 17 July 1920) is a Croatian water polo player. He competed for Yugoslavia in the 1948 Summer Olympics and in the 1952 Summer Olympics. He won a silver medal in 1952. ==References== ==Other websites== *profile Category:1920 births Category:Living people Category:Yugoslavian water polo players Category:Croatian water polo players Category:Olympic silver medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Olympic medalists for Croatia Category:1952 Summer Olympics
title: Marko Brainović
